0.9-(1+x+((x^(2))/2))*e^(-x) :X2 = 0.9685968893052013
0.1-(1+x+((x^(2))/2))*e^(-x) :X2 = 5.263022237438587
tan(40*pi/180)*((4/5)-cos(x)^2)-sin(x)*cos(x) :X2 = 0.9688391894365167
(140/26.50)*((1+x)^10)-((140/26.50)+1)*((1+x)^9)+1  :X2 = 0.1013822448853539
(140/21.50)*((1+x)^13)-((140/21.50)+1)*((1+x)^12)+1 :X2 = 0.10025661836037342
